channel.description: Recent content in netlify on Mohit Dodhia

item.title: Migrating to GitHub Pages
item.description: TL;DR: The website logistically didn’t make sense, especially with this blog being hosted on GitHub Pages and only accessible through the website. After a good deal of consideration, I finally pulled the plug on my website which was hosted on the domain www.mxhit.dev. This website was up and running for only a year but the decision to migrate was based on first principles of software engineering – this should have been my approach from the beginning however my reasons at the time were valid.
